name: Xebia France
description:
Xebia France is an IT consulting firm, employing 150 people. We proudly serve more than 50 customers annually in their digital transformation and train more than 3,000 trainees. Our clients work in all sectors of the economy and are both companies of the CAC40 and Startups. Agile transformation, Software development, Mobile application, Data: we provide innovative solutions and services to help organizations become digital winners. Our mission: Software Development Done Right.
The secret of Xebia's success lies in the dedicated, vigorous, smart and enthusiastic people that are committed to the company and its customers.
READ MORE...
